text: Are there any plans to sell individual modules again to the marketplace? If not, I'm just curious why?

I am a senior software engineer with 10+ years of full-stack web development experience and 5+ years of blockchain experience.
I am actively looking for a new job opportunity.

Hi <@U01B10S09FU>, we are planning on adding modules back into the marketplace. I dont have a timeline for when that will be but I will check in with the team internally and provide you with an update when I have one.
Thanks AJ! Appreciate the quick response. :thumbsup:
There is a <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> channel. Try posting this here with your portfolio link.
